title: Altair and Metrics collaborate to redefine semiconductor design verification
content: Metrics' DSim, when integrated with Altair’s tools, will offer an advanced simulation environment featuring superior simulation and debug capabilities. This synergy promises a transformative impact on the semiconductor industry by making high-quality EDA design tools more affordable and accessible, particularly for companies seeking to scale up simulations to accelerate their design cycles.

title: Mercedes-Benz Research and Development India collaborates with BITS Pilani for advanced technology research

title: Autonomous car rules advancing faster than the vehicles themselves: UN
content: Fully autonomous cars are still years away from hitting the streets, but internationally-agreed rules on their use could be ready by mid-2026, the United Nations has said. Furthermore, "we are planning to have a globally harmonised regulation on Automated Driving Systems (ADS) ready for mid-2026", he said.

title: Explainer: What's behind Volkswagen's USD 5 billion EV software bet on Rivian?
content: The tie-up is the latest in a string of deals by Volkswagen Chief Executive Oliver Blume, who took over in September 2022 after the ousting of Herbert Diess. title: For Tesla's futuristic new Cybertruck, a fourth recall
content: The company says in the documents that the front windshield wiper motor controller can stop working because it's getting too much electrical current. title: Revolutionising MSME automobile dealerships with affordable AI-Driven ERP Solutions
content: The MSME sector is a crucial part of the Indian economy but often lacks accessible technology solutions. title: Indian and EU startups pitch for cooperation in EV technologies
content: The India-European Union Trade and Technology Council (TTC) Working Group 2 on Friday held a pivotal start-up matchmaking event aimed at advancing battery recycling technologies for electric vehicles (EVs).
